description: Manage invoices, taxes and expenses programmatically.

blocks.name: getAccessToken
blocks.description: This endpoint allows to retrive access token.

blocks.name: refreshAccessToken
blocks.description: This endpoint allows to retrive access token from refresh token.

args.name: refreshToken
args.info: Refresh token obtained from getAccessToken method.

blocks.name: getIdentityInfo
blocks.description: The endpoint provides OAuth authentication, preferences, permissions, roles, and business information.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token obtained from getAccessToken method.

blocks.name: getExpense
blocks.description: The endpoint allows to retrive information about single expense.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token obtained from getAccessToken method.

args.name: include
args.info: Indicate which additional data will be include. Array. Example: category,project,...

blocks.name: createExpense
blocks.description: The endpoint allows to create new expense.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token obtained from getAccessToken method.

args.name: staffId
args.info: id of related staff member if applicable.

args.name: markupPercent
args.info: string-decimal, note of percent to mark expense up.

args.name: projectId
args.info: id of related project if applicable.

args.name: clientId
args.info: id of related client if applicable.

args.name: taxPercent2
args.info: string-decimal tax amount for second tax.

args.name: profileId
args.info: id of related profile if applicable.

args.name: accountName
args.info: name of related account if applicable.

args.name: transactionId
args.info: id of related transaction if applicable.

args.name: invoiceId
args.info: id of related invoice if applicable.

args.name: status
args.info: values from expense status table. 0 - internal (-internal- rather than client); 1 - outstanding (has client, needs to be applied to an invoice); 2 - invoiced (has client, attached to an invoice); 4 - recouped (has client, attached to an invoice, and paid).

args.name: bankName
args.info: name of bank expense was imported from, if applicable.

args.name: extSystemId
args.info: id of related contractor system if applicable.

args.name: extInvoiceId
args.info: id of related contractor invoice if applicable.

args.name: compoundedTax
args.info: true/false tax2 was a compound tax.

blocks.name: getAllExpenses
blocks.description: The endpoint allows to retrive information about all expenses.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token obtained from getAccessToken method.

args.name: page
args.info: The ID of the retun page. Default 0.

args.name: perPage
args.info: Number of results to return. Default 100.

args.name: include
args.info: Indicate which additional data will be include. Array. Example: category,project,...

args.name: profileId
args.info: id of related profile if applicable.

args.name: accountName
args.info: name of related account if applicable.

args.name: transactionId
args.info: id of related transaction if applicable.

args.name: invoiceId
args.info: id of related invoice if applicable.

args.name: status
args.info: values from expense status table. 0 - internal (-internal- rather than client); 1 - outstanding (has client, needs to be applied to an invoice); 2 - invoiced (has client, attached to an invoice); 4 - recouped (has client, attached to an invoice, and paid).

args.name: bankName
args.info: name of bank expense was imported from, if applicable.

args.name: extSystemId
args.info: id of related contractor system if applicable.

args.name: extInvoiceId
args.info: id of related contractor invoice if applicable.

args.name: compoundedTax
args.info: true/false tax2 was a compound tax.

blocks.description: The endpoint allows to delete expense.

args.info: Access token obtained from getAccessToken method.

blocks.name: getSingleExpenseCategory
blocks.description: The endpoint allows to retrive information about indecated expense category.

args.name: include
args.info: Indicate which additional data will be include. Comma-separated. Example: category,project,...

blocks.name: getInvoices
blocks.description: This endpoint allows to retrive information about invoices.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token obtained from getAccessToken method.

args.name: page
args.info: The ID of the retun page. Default 0.

args.name: perPage
args.info: Number of results to return. Default 100.

args.name: include
args.info: Indicate which additional data will be include. Comma-separated. Example: category,project,...

blocks.name: createSingleInvoice
blocks.description: This endpoint allows to create single invoice.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token obtained from getAccessToken method.

args.name: ownerId
args.info: id of creator of invoice. 1 if business admin, other if created by e.g. a contractor.

args.name: estimateId
args.info: id of associated estimate, 0 if none.

args.name: basecampId
args.info: id of connected basecamp account, 0 if none.

args.name: sentId
args.info: userid of user who sent the invoice, typically 1 for admin.

args.name: parent
args.info: id of object this invoice was generated from, 0 if none.

args.name: displayStatus
args.info: Description of status shown in FreshBooks UI, one of 'draft', 'created', 'sent', 'viewed', or 'outstanding'.

args.name: autobillStatus
args.info: one of retry, failed, or success.

args.name: paymentStatus
args.info: description of payment status. One of 'unpaid', 'partial', 'paid', and 'auto-paid'. See the v3_status table on this page for descriptions of each.

args.name: lastOrderStatus
args.info: describes status of last attempted payment.

args.name: disputeStatus
args.info: description of whether invoice has been disputed.

args.name: depositStatus
args.info: description of deposits applied to invoice. One of 'paid', 'unpaid', 'partial', 'none', and 'converted'.

args.name: autoBill
args.info: whether this invoice has a credit card saved.

args.name: v3Status
args.info: description of Invoice Status, see V3 Status Table.

args.name: generationDate
args.info: date invoice generated from object, null if it wasn't, YYYY-MM-DD if it was.

args.name: poNumber
args.info: Post Office box number for address on invoice.

args.name: address
args.info: First line of address on invoice.

args.name: depositAmount
args.info: amount required as deposit, null if none.

args.name: depositPercentage
args.info: percent of the invoice's value required as a deposit.

args.name: gmail
args.info: whether to send via ground mail.

args.name: showAttachments
args.info: whether attachments on invoice are rendered.

args.name: street2
args.info: second line of street for address on invoice.

args.name: code
args.info: zip code for address on invoice.

args.name: fname
args.info: First name of Client on invoice.

args.name: lname
args.info: Last name of client being invoiced.

args.name: vatName
args.info: Value Added Tax name if provided.

args.name: vatNumber
args.info: Value Added Tax number if provided.

args.name: dueOffsetDays
args.info: Number of days from creation that invoice is due.

blocks.name: createSingleItem
blocks.description: This endpoint allows to create new item.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token obtained from getAccessToken method.

args.name: quantity
args.info: decimal-string number to multiply unit cost by.

args.name: amount
args.info: amount paid on invoice, to two decimal places.

args.name: tax2
args.info: id of second tax on invoice if applicable.

blocks.description: This endpoint allows to retrive information about single item.

blocks.name: getPayments
blocks.description: This endpoint allows to retrive information about payments.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token obtained from getAccessToken method.

args.name: page
args.info: The ID of the retun page. Default 0.

args.name: perPage
args.info: Number of results to return. Default 100.

args.name: include
args.info: Indicate which additional data will be include. Comma-separated. Example: category,project,...

blocks.name: createSinglePayment
blocks.description: This endpoint allows to create new payment.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token obtained from getAccessToken method.

args.name: amount
args.info: amount paid on invoice, to two decimal places.

args.name: date
args.info: date the payment was made, YYYY-MM-DD format.

args.name: clientId
args.info: id of client who made the payment.

args.name: note
args.info: notes on payment, often used for credit card reference number.

args.name: overpaymentId
args.info: id of related overpayment if relevant.

args.name: gateway
args.info: the payment processor used, if any.

args.name: fromCredit
args.info: whether or not the payment was converted from a Credit on a Client's account.

args.name: fromCredit

blocks.name: getSystemInfo
blocks.description: An Accounting System represents an entity that can send invoices. It is the central point of association between all of a single Administrator of a single Business’ Invoices, Clients, Staff, Expenses, and Reports.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token obtained from getAccessToken method.

args.name: systemId
args.info: The ID of the system. The value is only meaningful if a user has access to multiple systems.

blocks.name: createSingleTax
blocks.description: This endpoint allows to create new tax.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token obtained from getAccessToken method.

args.name: name
args.info: The name of the new tax.

args.name: number
args.info: an external number that identifies your tax submission.

args.name: amount
args.info: string-decimal representing percentage value of tax.

args.name: compound
args.info: compound taxes are calculated on top of primary taxes. True || false
